dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-typing
dependencies.description:
This is a backport of the standard library typing module to Python
versions older than 3.6.

dependencies.name: py-functools32
dependencies.description:
Backport of the functools module from Python 3.2.3 for use on 2.7 and
PyPy.

dependent_to.name: py-crashtest
dependent_to.description:
Crashtest is a Python library that makes exceptions handling and
inspection easier.

dependent_to.name: py-clikit
dependent_to.description:
CliKit is a group of utilities to build beautiful and testable command
line interfaces.

dependent_to.name: py-poetry
dependent_to.description: Python dependency management and packaging made easy.

dependent_to.name: py-uhi
dependent_to.description:
Unified Histogram Interface: tools to help library authors work with
histograms

dependent_to.name: py-isort
dependent_to.description: A Python utility / library to sort Python imports.

dependent_to.name: py-cleo
dependent_to.description:
Cleo allows you to create beautiful and testable command-line
interfaces.
